DataElement.preferredName: Top Slide Digital Image Biospecimen Repository Submission Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Text indicator to describe if digital pictures of the top slides were obtained and sent on to the BCR.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Top Slide Digital Image Biospecimen Repository Submission
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: The uppermost part, side, or surface of something._A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study._A form of representation in which distinct objects (or digits) are used to express or represent something in the real world._Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic._Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products._A facility where things can be deposited for storage or safekeeping._The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: The uppermost part, side, or surface of something.:A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study.:A form of representation in which distinct objects (or digits) are used to express or represent something in the real world.:Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Concepts.definition: The uppermost part, side, or surface of something.
A flat rectangular piece of glass on which specimens can be mounted for microscopic study.
A form of representation in which distinct objects (or digits) are used to express or represent something in the real world.
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Property.preferredName: Biospecimen Repository  of Specimens and Reagents Submission
Property.preferredDefinition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.:A facility where things can be deposited for storage or safekeeping. :Submitted; referred for judgment or consideration.

Concepts.definition: Any material sample taken from a biological entity for testing, diagnostic, propagation, treatment or research purposes, including a sample obtained from a living organism or taken from the biological object after halting of all its life functions. Biospecimen can contain one or more components including but not limited to cellular molecules, cells, tissues, organs, body fluids, embryos, and body excretory products.
A facility where items can be deposited for storage or safekeeping.
The act of referring for judgment or consideration by others; the act of handing over something.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: attributes of a patient's laboratory sample, including the source, condition, and fixative.

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Indicator of Yes or No to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

Concepts.definition: Determination of a value is not relevant in the current context.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the results of evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.
